climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Machine Washable Rug: This machine washable rug is the best choice for high-traffic areas of your home with children and pets. Our rug is machine washable and very easy to care for. Use a broom or vacuum cleaner to remove dust or hair for daily care, If you want to thoroughly clean your carpet, Machine wash with cold water on a gentle cycle(do not add bleach), air dry, or dry on an air-only cycle without heat.

Safety Non-Slip Design: We integrate the rubber anti-slip dot array into the carpet backing that effectively keeps the carpet stable and preventing dangerous movement and slipping. You don't need to buy additional non-slip carpet pads. Your kids and pets can run and play safely on this rug while ensuring the safety of the elderly at home.

Stain Resistant Soft Durable: This washable rug is made of the high-quality spill and stain-resistant microfiber and the area rug is treated with a stain-resistant finish to ensure that liquids will not penetrate after spilled on the rug, including coffee, wine, milk, or pet urine. The rug has a 0.15" super soft non-shedding chenille fabric, combined with innovative chenille craftsmanship and fine stitching, making our rugs softer and more durable than other rugs of the same material.

Widely Used Area Rug: Our rug is versatile, here available in three giant sizes 5x7ft, 8x10ft, and 9x12ft to let you freely choose. our bohemian rug for living room, bedroom, dining room, kitchen, and other high-traffic areas provides effortless style， it can also be used as decor in your study, hearth area, family room, guest room, home office. This washable rug is the best choice for your home.
Classic Graphic Design: Gent drizz washable rugs offering vintage, faded, traditional, bohemian, Medallion, modern, classic, and shabby chic styles, There is always one that can be your best choice.

Excellent Service: There will be some creases when you use it for the first time, please don't worry, the creases will disappear automatically after a few days. Or it will become flat immediately after ironing. 24-hour online customer service. If you have any questions about Gent drizz living room Rugs, please be sure to contact us in time and we will solve your problem perfectly.

Is this rug washable? Yes, can be washed at low temperatures by the washer. Our rugs have passed hundreds of repeated machine wash tests Is it going to fade after a long time of use? No, our rugs have been clear dried repeatedly without showing any signs of color loss. There are wrinkles when I open It, how do I remove them? Don't worry！ it’s normal as it was folded to travel across the world.Lay it flat on the floor for a few days and it should recover naturally. It helps much better to use a steam iron to iron the backing. Would it be easier to clean with a vacuum cleaner? Yes, it is very suitable, the vacuum cleaner will easily absorb the hair dust and the stains in the hair crevice. If it is dog urine, milk, wine and other liquid stains, just wipe it with a damp towel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this rug
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for pulling my room together while having two rambunctious bernedoodles. It’s not plush and soft yet soft to the touch which makes this rug super easy to clean. Thank you and I hope to be able to purchase a few more for our farmhouse remodel. Looks, quality, price point can’t be beat. Pictures are exact couldn’t be happier with this purchase as you can tell!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This rug is beautiful. It is just perfect for under my dining room table. The colors are subtle yet blend perfectly. The price was very reasonable and it is soft underfoot. I have not had a reason to wash it, but it is light enough that it can be machine washed if necessary

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great washable rug
reviews.reviewText: I ordered a 5x7 rug. It came promptly. It is soft, the colors are nice and it’s exactly what I wanted for a heavy traffic room. It is not plush, so if you’d prefer a bit more plush, you might get a cushion underneath. It is being used in our family room. We have kids and a dog. It is simple to vacuum or sweep off. I have not yet washed this rug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the cost
reviews.reviewText: Ordering a rug online is so difficult, it’s hard to match colors and textures, etc. The coloring is pretty true to the pictures, so it matched very well. It came folded rather than rolled, so much less creasing and flattened within 1 day of use. I will say it is VERY thin, so it’s definitely more for looks than comfort. If anything, it is not very comfortable to sit on if you’re a floor sitter; but, this is perfect if you have pets and just needed to throw something down so they don’t damage floors. Spills may go through it, though, so maybe consider a layer underneath or thicker rug if you are concerned. Very easy to clean, stains come right out so far. Overall, colors in pictures are accurate, shipped in a way that reduced any wrinkles or creasing in the rug, very thin material, very easy to set up and lightweight, and does not shift or slide because of material that allows good grip on the bottom (I didn’t even need to use anything to keep it in place!). For the cost, I’d say it’s worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this new rug. I just got this and put it down today. Really brightens up the room. I didn’t comment on easy to clean because I haven’t had to clean it yet. I read others comments before ordering it. Some people say they put it in their washing machine to clean it. My rug is 9x12 so I’d have to have a pretty big washing machine. I’m very pleased with this rug so far. It was very easy to unfold and position on the floor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thin, but pretty
reviews.reviewText: As other reviewers have stated it is a thin rug. However, it is very pretty and suits my purpose for a covering for my wood floor so that my swivel desk chair doesn't ruin it. If you wanted something a little more substantial, I'm sure a thick rug pad would work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Area rug for the price
reviews.reviewText: Thin but washable, colors are true to photo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the size, love the color!
